titlestmt.titleproper: Julius Samuel Held papers relating to Saul Baizerman and Leonard Baskin

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2023-04-06 16:07:34 -0400.

did.unittitle: Julius Samuel Held papers relating to Saul Baizerman and Leonard Baskin

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Use of original papers requires an appointment and is limited to the Archives' Washington, D.C., Research Center. Microfilmed materials must be consulted on microfilm. Contact Reference Services for more information.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Correspondence with Leonard Baskin, Saul Baizerman and J. Paul Getty; biographical information; photographs of the artists and their work; printed matter; and a sketch of Baizerman by Held. Also included are writings and photographs by Held about a Florentine painting.

altformavail.head: Existence and Location of Copies
altformavail.p: 35mm microfilm roll 2535 available at Archives of American Art offices and through interlibrary loan.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Art historian, educator, Bennington, Vt. Eminent scholar of Rubens. Worked as an advisor to art collectors, including J. Paul Getty.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Held wrote an catalog introduction on Baizerman for a 1953 exhibition at Walker Art Center in Minneapolis, Minn.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Julius S. Held papers, ca. 1918-1999, are located at The Getty Research Institution Special Collections.
